description: The order and frequency in which pupils return will be up to individual head teachers.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey schools to reopen to all years on 22 June
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey schools to reopen to all years on 22 June - BBC News
maintext: Senator Tracey Vallois said: "The clear and welcome message from STAC is that children, education and wider wellbeing must come first and that an extended absence from school will only lead to negative effects on mental health of both children and parents.
